links.title: Apple's iPhone 8 topped best-sellers list, iPhone X steady in third
links.description: Apple's iPhone 8 topped the global best sellers list for the month of May according to data from Counterpoint's Market Pulse, a tool used for analysing the smartphone market. The iPhone 8 was trailed by the Galaxy S9 Plus, iPhone X, Xiaomi Redmi 5A, and the iPhone 8 Plus.

links.title: Tesla Model 3 in Vancouver Tesla showroom
links.description: This is the very first official appearance of the Model 3 in Canada. Along with Toronto, Vancouverites got to line up on the morning of March 2nd and were treated to the sight of a red Model 3 in all its beauty. We each got 5 minutes of a guided tour to inspect it at close quarters.
